p1.name: Quantum Wireless Earbuds Pro
p1.description: Premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear audio quality. Perfect for music lovers and professionals on the go.

p2.name: Minimalist Smartwatch
p2.description: Sleek smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and premium materials. Track your fitness goals while maintaining an elegant aesthetic.

p3.name: Zen Meditation Cushion Set
p3.description: Handcrafted meditation cushions made from organic materials. Enhance your mindfulness practice with comfort and style.

p4.name: Premium Leather Backpack
p4.description: Handcrafted Italian leather backpack with modern design. Spacious compartments and premium hardware for the discerning professional.

p5.name: Ultra-Thin Laptop Stand
p5.description: Aluminum laptop stand with adjustable height and ergonomic design. Improve your workspace setup and reduce neck strain.

p6.name: Artisan Coffee Maker
p6.description: Professional-grade coffee maker for the perfect brew every morning. Precision temperature control and elegant design.

p7.name: Designer Sunglasses
p7.description: Stylish sunglasses with UV400 protection and polarized lenses. Make a statement while protecting your eyes.

p8.name: Wireless Charging Pad
p8.description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. Sleek design with LED indicator.

p9.name: Yoga Mat Premium
p9.description: Eco-friendly yoga mat with superior grip and cushioning. Perfect for all yoga styles and fitness routines.

p10.name: Cashmere Scarf
p10.description: Luxurious cashmere scarf in timeless design. Soft, warm, and elegant - the perfect accessory for any season.
